pr_title: Add provider task properties table and fix BlackDuckAccumulator

timeline.message: Feat(Database): Add provider task properties table and fix BlackDuckAccumulator
Fix(Java): Make provider task properties extend the correct entity

timeline.bodyText: Should the getTaskProperty also take the configId?  Even though the task name is unique because it currently has the config id in the task name.
timeline.author: psantos1113
